code: var CELL_COLOR_WHITE="#fff";var CELL_COLOR_BLACK="#000000";export function board(SIZE){var padding=7;var fontSize=18;document.getElementById("Board").innerHTML="";document.getElementById("Iterations").innerHTML="";var container=document.getElementById("Board");container.style.setProperty("--Qgrid-rows",SIZE);container.style.setProperty("--Qgrid-cols",SIZE);for(var j=0;j<SIZE*SIZE;j++){var cell=document.createElement("div");var item=document.createElement("i");cell.appendChild(item).className="fas fa-crown";container.appendChild(cell).className="Qgrid-item q-array-tile";}var arrayTiles=document.getElementsByClassName("q-array-tile");var crownsI=document.getElementsByClassName("fa-crown");for(var l=0;l<arrayTiles.length;l++){arrayTiles[l].style.padding="".concat(padding,"px");crownsI[l].style.fontSize="".concat(fontSize,"px");}var c=0;for(var a=0;a<8;a++){for(var b=0;b<8;b++){if((a+b)%2==0){arrayTiles[c].style.backgroundColor=CELL_COLOR_BLACK;crownsI[c].style.color=CELL_COLOR_BLACK;c++;}else{arrayTiles[c].style.backgroundColor=CELL_COLOR_WHITE;crownsI[c].style.color=CELL_COLOR_WHITE;c++;}}}}
